document.full_text: libyan foreign minister moussa koussa, one of muammar gaddafi's closest advisers and a former spy chief, flew to britain on wednesday and a close friend said he defected because of attacks by gaddafi forces on civilians.
document.title: libya's foreign minister defects, arrives in britain
lines_and_colors: libyan foreign minister moussa koussa, one of muammar gaddafi's closest advisers and a former spy chief, flew to britain on wednesday and a close friend said he defected because of attacks by gaddafi forces on civilians.
